name: Flame Medal
description: Awarded for outstanding performance in fiery challenges.

name: Sport Medal
description: Given for excellence in sports and athletic events.

name: Medal of Honor
description: Awarded for exceptional bravery and service.

name: Magician Medal
description: For those who have mastered the art of magic.

name: Crunchyroll Medal
description: Awarded for dedication to anime and manga culture.

name: Skull Medal
description: Given for achievements in horror-themed challenges.

name: Cane Medal
description: Recognizes wisdom and guidance in the community.

name: Ninja Medal
description: For stealth and skill in covert operations.

name: Triorb Medal
description: Awarded for excellence in multi-dimensional challenges.
